contents.text: Thank you for calling Zuora in Peninsula, where we power cloud-based subscription solutions for businesses in every industry.
For sales and new subscription inquiries, please press 1.
To learn about our subscription pricing and product features, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative for subscription details.

navigationGoals: Get detailed pricing and plan options for a new Zuora subscription so I can decide quickly
I need detailed pricing and feature information for a new subscription plan.
I need a detailed breakdown of Zuora's subscription API pricing tiers and feature comparisons.
I need help signing up for a subscription plan and want to know the cost.
As a physics grad student, I need details on subscription plans and feature limits for my research project.

contents.text: To schedule a personalized product demonstration, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our demo team.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized Zuora product demonstration to evaluate key features for my team
I’d like to schedule a personalized demo to see how this solution fits my needs.
I want to schedule a deep-dive demo of the Zuora platform focusing on subscription management and integration.
I would like to schedule a personalized product demonstration to see how it works.
I’d like to schedule a detailed demo of the Zuora platform for our university lab.

contents.text: For customer support and billing, please press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical integration error with the Zuora API for immediate resolution
I’m experiencing technical issues with my subscription integration and need troubleshooting help.
I need help troubleshooting an authentication error with Zuora's REST API endpoint.
I'm experiencing a technical problem and need assistance troubleshooting it.
I’m experiencing an API error integrating Zuora with our data analysis pipeline and need technical support.

contents.text: For billing, payments, and account inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: Clarify a recent invoice charge and update my payment method on file efficiently
I want to review my recent invoice and update my payment details.
I need to review my recent subscription billing statements and update my payment method.
I have a question about my bill and need help with my payment.
I need to review my current billing statement and update payment details for my subscription.
